entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checkbox broken in Android #19313
  • Border shadow not rendered correctly #19312
  • .Net Maui8 VisualElement.TranslateTo() runs incorrectly #19311
  • [regression/8.0.0-nightly] Nightly build 9725 broke boxviews do not get their color set anymore #19309
  • Crash in release build caused by style #19306

Closed

  • Release build doesn't deploy on iOS/iPhone emulator #14979
  • TextToSpeech rate and current reading index #15290
  • Reland #7143 ([X] simplify and avoid duplication in conversion) #9294
    Under Consideration
  • FlyoutPage is not scrollable in MacCatalyst #16938
    Backlog
  • Issue #19307
  • [regression/8.0.3] [Android] Unable to set Button CornerRadius to 0 #19052
    Backlog
  • Button CornerRadius is not working with BackgroundColor #18090
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] MAUI Ignores Button.CornerRadius = '0' on Android device #18807
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState on MAUI Blazor (Hybrid) when opened from Android IntentFilter #19304
  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented=false throws InvalidOperationException: 'Can't change IsPresented when setting Default' #11785
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow for disabling default MAUI usings when embedding #19314
    area/native-embedding
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • Add design time converters #19301
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    community ✨
  • Improve appium install on CI build agents #19248
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, testing-flakiness
